methods.name: public CollectionItemInfo.Builder setHeading(boolean heading)
methods.comment:
* Sets the collection item is a heading.
             *
             * @param heading The heading state
             * @return This builder

methods.name: public CollectionItemInfo.Builder setColumnIndex(int columnIndex)
methods.comment:
* Sets the column index at which the item is located.
             *
             * @param columnIndex The column index
             * @return This builder

methods.name: public CollectionItemInfo.Builder setRowIndex(int rowIndex)
methods.comment:
* Sets the row index at which the item is located.
             *
             * @param rowIndex The row index
             * @return This builder

methods.name: public CollectionItemInfo.Builder setColumnSpan(int columnSpan)
methods.comment:
* Sets the number of columns the item spans.
             *
             * @param columnSpan The number of columns spans
             * @return This builder

methods.name: public CollectionItemInfo.Builder setRowSpan(int rowSpan)
methods.comment:
* Sets the number of rows the item spans.
             *
             * @param rowSpan The number of rows spans
             * @return This builder

methods.name: public CollectionItemInfo.Builder setSelected(boolean selected)
methods.comment:
* Sets the collection item is selected.
             *
             * @param selected The number of rows spans
             * @return This builder

methods.comment:
